experiences.title: Software Engineer
experiences.subtitle: Q3 Technologies
workDescription: Maintained and enhanced Rail Help for 5 operators by building React + .NET Core components and fixing defects, preventing interruptions across 200+ daily train schedules and improving booking reliability for 50,000+ passengers.
Developed React + Sitecore 9.3 modules (MVC, .NET Core/C#, Helix, Next.js) that improved content publishing speed by 32% and overall system performance by 25%.
Integrated SonarQube in CI with Docker, Git, and Bitbucket; automated quality gates and reduced defects by 20%, cutting release time by 15%.

experiences.title: Software Engineer
experiences.subtitle: Altudo
workDescription: Led development of the Society for Neuroscience website using MVC and Sitecore integrations, improving publishing speed by 20% and reducing release time for new pages by 2 hours.
Built a responsive Sitecore 10.2 site with React, .NET, and TypeScript; reduced frontend load time by 30% and met WCAG accessibility standards, increasing average session duration by 18%.
Collaborated with QA and PMs in Agile to build modules, migrate content, and deliver updates for multiple clients on Sitecore and SQL Server, delivering 100% of projects on time.

experiences.title: Software Engineering Intern
experiences.subtitle: Nvidia
workDescription: Developed a motion‑adaptive deinterlacing algorithm in C++, reducing visual artifacts by 35% and improving clarity across multiple video pipelines.
Integrated CUDA‑based parallel processing into FFmpeg workflows, achieving 3× faster processing and enabling 60 FPS playback with 50% lower rendering latency.
Executed 100+ test cycles on Linux with QA to validate pipelines, improving reliability by 25% and ensuring broadcast‑grade results.
